text: Abaho gendeni hanhu aho hayasagule Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wenu kwika twaga jake, na baho kuulongozi wake mugaje mafungu ga longo ga ndiya yenu na ga divai yenu na gamavuta genu na ga wana wa chaudele wa ng'ombe zenu na ng'hondolo zenu, tendeni vino ili muifunze kumtegeleze Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wenu siku zose.
